name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Snake Game: Classic Meets Modern

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Snake Game is a modern spin on the classic Nokia Snake. Retro and old school snake. Slither away!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Snake Game is a modern spin on the classic Snake game everyone loved to play. Now you can play Snake on any of your browser tabs.

Here are some of the best features:
• Five unique levels of fun challenges.
• A different kind of snake - Robo Snake!
• Retro upbeat music to keep you playing.
• Pass through the edge of the screen (like in Pacman).
• High Scores.
